dmca.title: [EV1-C1836638A] The complaint!!! Infringement of copyrights!!!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, November 15, 2006 5:23 PM Posted To: DMCA Conversation: [EV1-C1836638A] The complaint!!! Infringement of copyrights!!! Subject: [EV1-C1836638A] The complaint!!! Infringement of copyrights!!! ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. The complaint!!! Infringement of copyrights!!! Added by system at Wednesday, Nov 15 2006 11:09 pm X-MailFrom: cgshop@europe.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.212] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Nov 15 23:08:43 2006 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by MAILCORE.THEPLANET.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 15 Nov 2006 23:05:09 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 15 Nov 2006 23:05:08 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1163653503-10979-302-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from webmail-outgoing.us4.outblaze.com (webmail-outgoing.us4.outblaze.com [205.158.62.67]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 5B20B711B for ; Wed, 15 Nov 2006 23:05:08 -0600 (CST) Received: from unknown (unknown [192.168.9.180]) by webmail-outgoing.us4.outblaze.com (Postfix) with QMQP id 21DEF18007CE for ; Thu, 16 Nov 2006 05:02:23 +0000 (GMT) X-OB-Received: from unknown (205.158.62.55) by wfilter.us4.outblaze.com; 16 Nov 2006 05:02:21 -0000 Received: by ws1-3.us4.outblaze.com (Postfix, from userid 1001) id 29CD31024D; Thu, 16 Nov 2006 05:02:22 +0000 (GMT) Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="_----------=_1163653342136400" MIME-Version: 1.0 From: "Denis Ivanov" To: abuse@ev1servers.net Date: Thu, 16 Nov 2006 00:02:21 -0500 X-ASG-Orig-Subj: The complaint!!! Infringement of copyrights!!! Subject: The complaint!!! Infringement of copyrights!!! Importance: high Received: from [217.168.70.252] by ws1-3.us4.outblaze.com with http for cgshop@europe.com; Thu, 16 Nov 2006 00:02:21 -0500 X-Originating-Ip: 217.168.70.252 X-Originating-Server: ws1-3.us4.outblaze.com Message-Id: <20061116050222.29CD31024D@ws1-3.us4.outblaze.com> X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: cgshop@europe.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 16 Nov 2006 05:05:08.0794 (UTC) FILETIME=[C993C1A0:01C7093C] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello. We are the official distributor of production Digital-Tutors, and as other studios in Russia. As a matter of fact the only thing. It is a training material for studying computer schedules. Is issued on DVD. http://www.digitaltutors.com/digital_tutors/resellers.php ASIA PACIFIC/Russia/www.cgshop.ru If to look here: http://mirawing.org that becomes clear, that it not lawful distribution of our production. It breaks our copyrights. http://mirawing.org - the hosting to a platform settles down on yours. IP 66.98.242.221 We ask you to arrange in current of 3 day and to give us the answer. It would be desirable to solve the problem peace means. In cases of ignoring of our complaint, we shall be compelled to bring an action against the owner of the domain http://mirawing.org, and it also spoils your reputation. Yours faithfully, Denis Ivanov cgshop@europe.com -- Search for products and services at: http://search.mail.com MIME element (text/html)

Hello.
We are the official distributor of production Digital-Tutors, and as other studios in Russia.
As a matter of fact the only thing. It is a training material for studying computer schedules.
Is issued on DVD. http:// www.digitaltutors.com/digital_tutors/resellers.php ASIA PACIFIC/Russia/www.cgshop.ru

If to look here: http://mirawing.org that becomes clear, that it not lawful distribution of our production. It breaks our copyrights.
http://mirawing.org - the hosting to a platform settles down on yours. IP 66.98.242.221
We ask you to arrange in current of 3 day and to give us the answer.
It would be desirable to solve the problem peace means.
In cases of ignoring of our complaint, we shall be compelled to bring an action against the owner of the domain http://mirawing.org, and it also spoils your reputation.
Yours faithfully, Denis Ivanov

cgshop@europe.com
